languages.text: "Картина, которую ты рисуешь, слишком мрачная. Огонь — хороший символ, когда он освещает и согревает. Не когда уничтожает".
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
languages.original_text: "Картина, которую ты рисуешь, слишком мрачная. Огонь — хороший символ, когда он освещает и согревает. Не когда уничтожает".

traits.locale_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."
"The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

languages.text: « L'image que vous en donnez est trop sinistre. La flamme est un symbole du bien lorsqu'elle éclaire le chemin et réchauffe l'âme, pas quand elle détruit. »
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: « L'image que vous en donnez est trop sinistre. La flamme est un symbole du bien lorsqu'elle éclaire le chemin et réchauffe l'âme, pas quand elle détruit. »

languages.text: “你描绘的图景太残酷了。火焰其实是个美好的象征，它能照亮道路，温暖灵魂，不仅仅只会带来毁灭。”
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: “你描绘的图景太残酷了。火焰其实是个美好的象征，它能照亮道路，温暖灵魂，不仅仅只会带来毁灭。”

languages.text: "Ihr malt ein zu düsteres Bild. Eine Flamme ist ein gutes Symbol, wenn sie den Weg weist und die Seele wärmt. Nicht, wenn sie zerstört."
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr malt ein zu düsteres Bild. Eine Flamme ist ein gutes Symbol, wenn sie den Weg weist und die Seele wärmt. Nicht, wenn sie zerstört."

languages.text: «Tal y como lo describes, parece más grave. Una llama es un buen símbolo cuando ilumina el camino y apacigua el alma. No cuando la destruye».
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: «Tal y como lo describes, parece más grave. Una llama es un buen símbolo cuando ilumina el camino y apacigua el alma. No cuando la destruye».

languages.text: 「お前が描いている絵はあまりにも険しい。炎は道を照らし、魂を暖める良き象徴だ。破壊するものではない」
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が描いている絵はあまりにも険しい。炎は道を照らし、魂を暖める良き象徴だ。破壊するものではない」

languages.text: "Çizdiğin resim fazla sert. Alev; yolu aydınlattığında ve ruhu ısıttığında iyi gelir, yok olduğunda değil."
languages.original_text: "The picture you are painting is too grim. A flame is a good symbol when it lights the way and warms the soul. Not when it destroys."

traits.locale_text: "Çizdiğin resim fazla sert. Alev, yolu aydınlattığında ve ruhu ısıttığında iyi gelir; yok olduğunda değil."
